outputs.output_descr:
"The Legal Sector Master Plan (LSMP), which outlines the broad requirements for the development of the legal sector into a comprehensive legal system, has been formally adopted by the Government of Lao PDR in September 2009. The implementation of the LSMP requires a preparatory and transitory phase in order to set up the adequate conditions for the start of a comprehensive sectoral programme. Hence, in accordance with the Country Programme Action Plan, this Work Plan will provide support to the Ministry of Justice and all legal institutions involved in getting the required national coordination mechanism established. Besides, the Work Plan will ensure the follow-up of preparatory activities previously implemented through the Initiation Plan for the support to the implementation of the LSMP.

Outputs:

Output 1. Support to the final establishment of LSMP coordination structures and contribution to GSWG and LIOSSWG activities
 
Output2. Support to the finalization of the LSMP Implementation Framework and concrete Action Plan under the 4 pillars
 
Output3. More visible implementation and follow up of LSMP pilot activities"

project_descr: This initiation programme is made to comprisis of two non-consecutive mission which will consult, on formulate and seek for a modality to implement and operationalize the LSMP
project_title: LSMP: Support to Implementation of LegalSectorMasterPlan
